title: People
heading: “We deliver far more for our clients than what would be thought possible”

member.name: Chetan Kothari
member.blurb: Likes to code. and many more ...

member.name: Sneha Koti
member.blurb: MavenHive used to be an idyllic commune of trusting mavens working in harmony. And then she joined us. We now have a generally distrustful atmosphere replete with hot-dogging and vote fudging. Will post a blurb as soon as our official PR person can find his laptop, which he had forgotten to chain to his desk.

cta.heading: We are always Hiring!!
cta.content:
We have a saying at MavenHive, “We are always Hiring!”
That’s not because we are in need of more warm bodies to bill to clients ! But, because it is so difficult to find the right people to work with that you have to constantly be on the lookout for the next perfect fit.
